message: I have a fantastic product for you today, Bob! It's one of my best and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it.  It's priced at $10000, which is a great deal for the value it offers.  Would you like to purchase it?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm hesitant to purchase without knowing more about its specific features and benefits. Can you tell me more about what makes this product so great?

Hello Bob!  I have a product available today that's sure to be a great addition to your collection.  While I can't go into too much detail about its specific features, I can assure you it's a fantastic opportunity at $10000.  Are you interested?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm still a bit cautious about buying without more information. I understand you can't disclose everything, but could you at least tell me if this product is closer to the high-quality or low-quality end of the spectrum?

Hi Bob!  I have another great product for you today.  I know you're looking for value, and this one fits the bill perfectly.  While I can't give away all the details, I can say it's a solid product that's sure to be a good addition to your collection.  Would you like to take a chance on it at the excellent price of $10000?

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I need more information before I can consider a purchase. Could you give me any details about the product's features, even if it's just a general category or function?  That would help me decide if it's worth the risk.

Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product for you today!  I know you're looking for value, and this one is definitely worth considering. While I can't tell you all about it, I can say it's a unique product that's sure to stand out.  Would you like to take a chance on it for $10000?

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still unsure.  Could you offer any indication of how confident you are in this product's quality?  Perhaps a rating scale or a simple 'high' or 'low' assessment would be helpful.

Hello Bob!  I have a product available today that I'm truly excited about.  It's one of my best, and I'm confident it's going to exceed your expectations.  While I can't give you all the details, I can assure you this is a high-quality product that's worth every penny of the $10000 price tag.  Are you interested in taking a look?

Alice, I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I've learned that your descriptions don't always match the reality.  Could you provide any concrete evidence to support your claims about this product's quality?  Maybe some independent reviews or a detailed description of its features would be convincing.

Hi Bob, I have a product for you today that's perfect for someone who likes to take a chance.  It's a unique item that's sure to be a conversation starter, and it's priced at a very attractive $10000.  Would you be interested in taking a chance on it?

Alice, I'm starting to feel like you're trying to push me into buying without giving me the information I need to make a good decision. I need more than just vague descriptions. Can you offer anything specific about this product's features or benefits? I'm not interested in blind gambles.

Hello Bob, I understand you're looking for more details, and I appreciate your cautious approach. This time, I'm offering a product that truly stands out. While I can't reveal everything, I can assure you it's a high-quality item with exceptional performance and durability. It's a unique opportunity to own something special at an incredibly affordable price of $10000. Would you like to take a chance on it?

Even a general category would be helpful.  I'm looking for a product that will be a good investment, not just a novelty item.

That would show me you're confident in your product and willing to stand behind it.
